examples.example: 每天坚持运动能让我们的身体更加健康有活力。

translate.english: Keeping exercising every day can make our bodies healthier and more energetic.

examples.example: 运动是保持身心健康的重要方式，让我们一起积极参与运动吧。

translate.english: Exercise is an important way to keep physical and mental health. Let's actively participate in sports together.

examples.example: 运动让我们充满活力，更好地享受生活的美好。

translate.english: Exercise makes us full of vitality and enjoy the beauty of life better.
